channel.title: [PI] SmdScape
channel.description:
I've begun working on my server again. Here are some screenshots~ [spoiler] [img]http://i.imgur.com/fmxVzIb.png[/img] [/spoiler]
[size=12pt][b]Quests[/b][/size] [spoiler]Quest points also save and add up.
Completed - Black Knights' Fortress Cook's Assistant Dragon Slayer Rune Mysteries Sheep Shearer Shield of Arrav
In progress - Imp catcher Priest in Peril[/spoiler]
Updates below --
2/19/2014:
[ul][li]Began working on Dragon Slayer.[/li] [li]Added every bone to Prayer.[/li] [li]Added functioning lamps.[/li] [li]Added Ice Queen.[/li] [li]Added dragons in Brimhaven dungeon.[/li] [li]Updating quest progress.[/li][/ul] 2/20/2014: [ul][li]Completed Dragon Slayer quest.[/li] [li]Completed Cook's Assistant quest.[/li][/ul] 2/21/2014 [ul][li]Added quest complete interfaces.[/li] [li]Completed Slayer tasks (level requirements, all tasks), all that's left to do is place the npcs and add item requirements (like slayer gloves being needed for this and that, mirror shield for this and that)[/li][/ul] 2/22/2014 [ul][li]Added glassblowing.[/li][/ul] 8/4/2014
[ul][li]Changed quest 'Cabin Fever' back to actual text rather than it displaying your crush bonus.[/li] [li]Saved all F2P quest variables.[/li] [li]Added additional shops in Ardy.[/li] [li]Began adding messages when objects were clicked.[/li] [li]Fun little scroll drop that relates to the chest at home ;3[/li] [li]Added sheep shearing quest.[/li][/ul] [font=verdana]8/5/2014[/font] [ul][li][font=verdana]Balanced necklace (Yin-Yang necklace with altered stats)[/font][/li] [li]Added Silver and Gold to smelt-able ores. Added multiple ore requirements.[/li] [li]Added skill tomes.[/li] [li]Added Christmas crackers.[/li] [li]Started Black Knight's Fortress quest.[/li][/ul] [font=verdana]8/6/2014[/font] [ul][li][font=verdana]Fixed Dragon Slayer quest.[/font][/li] [li][font=verdana]Clicking on banks prompts you to decide between opening the bank and doing nothing rather than just opening it immediately.[/font][/li] [li][font=verdana]Began adding aggressive NPCs.[/font][/li] [li][font=verdana]Began adding considerably more thieving options.[/font][/li][/ul] [font=verdana]8/8/2014[/font] [ul][li][font=verdana]All meat is now cook-able.[/font][/li] [li]Began adding shortcuts.[/li] [li]Began adding all mining spots.[/li] [li]Added staff enchanting. Turns regular element staffs into element battlestaffs.[/li][/ul] [font=verdana]8/11/2014[/font] [ul][li][font=verdana]Leather crafting works.[/font][/li] [li][font=verdana]Zaff has his own store.[/font][/li] [li][font=verdana]Added Magic Logs. (Incredibly annoying seeing an item without a model)[/font][/li][/ul] [font=verdana]8/13/2014[/font] [ul][li][font=verdana]Fixed Sheep Shearer quest.[/font][/li] [li][font=verdana]Added sailing.[/font][/li] [li][font=verdana]Salve amulet works properly on ALL undead npcs.[/font][/li] [li][font=verdana]Can smelt gold and silver now.[/font][/li][/ul] [font=verdana]8/21/2014[/font] [ul][li][font=verdana]Stated working on the skill menus.[/font][/li][/ul] 5/27/2015
[ul][li]Black Knights' Fortress quest[/li] [li]Rouges Den - Cooking, Banker & Wall safes[/li] [li]Report System[/li] [li]Highscores[/li] [li]Improved Spec bar[/li] [li]Glory recharging[/li] [li]Bones to peaches/bananas[/li] [li]Cape dying[/li] [li]Desert heat/cactus cutting[/li] [li]God Books w/ preaches[/li] [li]GS specs[/li] [li]Most skill menus[/li][/ul] 5/28/2015
[ul][li]Fixed bank dupe.[/li] [li]Birds nests[/li] [li]Proper stall thieving. If at a gem stall, you can steal gems. If at a seed stall, you steal multiple seeds of one ID at a time, etc...[/li] [li]All food has been added[/li][/ul] 5/29/2015
[ul][li]Cycle events[/li] [li]Cycle-based woodcutting/mining[/li] [li]Ava's Accumulator[/li] [li]Dragon Claws[/li][/ul] 6/3/2015
[ul][li]NPC clipping[/li] [li]Can open doors, climb stairs and ladders.[/li] [li]Started working on Shield of Arrav quest.[/li] [li]Banking works flawlessly. Insert, no longer generates random items if you drag item1 on item2.[/li][/ul] 6/10/2015
[ul][li]Added spirit shields.[/li] [li]Tab to reply to private messages.[/li][/ul] 6/12/2015
[ul][li]Added Slayer helm.[/li] [li]Added Slayer helm effect.[/li][/ul] 9/5/2015
[ul][li]Added Ava's Accumulator and effects.[/li] [li]Added proper books. (you can flip through pages, etc.)[/li] [li]Finished Shield of Arrav.[/li] [li]Started on legitimate training spots.[/li][/ul] 9/13/2015
[ul][li]Added milling.[/li] [li]Re-doing every npc drop.[/li] [li]Changed quest interface.[/li] [li]Can open gates.[/li][/ul] 10/20/2015
[ul][li]Added proper Kalphite Queen [/li][/ul] 10/21/2015
[ul][li]Zanaris and Entrana are completed[/li] [li]All fishing spots have been added.[/li] [li]Items spawn throughout the world, just like on runescape.[/li][/ul] 10/26/2015
[ul][li]Added bob repairing broken barrows items. Only works on fully degraded equipment.[/li] [li]Proper amulet of glory, can also recharge underneath hero's guild[/li][/ul] 10/28/2015
[ul][li]Added Fight Cave with 63 waves.[/li] [li]Added warning going into wildly.[/li][/ul] 1/23/2016
[ul][li]Added pies, pizzas, tuna potatoes, cakes and more.[/li] [li]Player walks towards object if item is used on object.[/li][/ul]

item.title: [PI] SmdScape
item.dc:creator: @SmdScape SmdScape
item.description:
@SmdScape wrote:

Yeah, definitely been a while haha.

Any pictures in particular? I’ve done a bit too much to take pics/make gifs of it all lol

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] SmdScape
item.dc:creator: @SmdScape SmdScape
item.description:
@SmdScape wrote:

[quote=“Lil_Smok3r, post:12, topic:540178”][quote author=lare69 link=topic=659033.msg4443776#msg4443776 date=1407812574]
looks alright, you should probably change the name though if you’re looking to host it
[/quote]
Yeah, people will think you’re immature (which you’re probably not), but good luck with the server though
And I like the quests, will you be adding your own?[/quote]
It’s alright, I’ll just stick to it as is
Thank you!

And possibly?
I’m not exactly sure on that one, but truth be told, I probably will and it should end up being at least an hour long

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] SmdScape
item.dc:creator: @SmdScape SmdScape
item.description:
@SmdScape wrote:

zuppers:

If you want to edit your topic pm a moderator.

Oh I see, thank you.
I wasn’t aware of this :3

Anyone have any ideas on what to do next?
Like, fun activities wise?

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] SmdScape
item.dc:creator: @SmdScape SmdScape
item.description:
@SmdScape wrote:

So apparently my thread didn’t post when I originally intended it to and as such, I wasn’t able to use the second post for updates.

Encryption:

Looking forward to the development, good luck. I wouldn’t agree with the name you chose though, but it’s your project none-the-less.

Yeah, I agree with you on that one…
I’ve renamed it!

firstchoice8:

gl with this project. The name might make players avoid the server though.

Thanks and it’d certainly catch my attention

Pure_:

For interfaces try this as a starting point - I had full herblore with interfaces until I stopped caring (meaning you should be able to do the same).

Thank you for the link, but it seems a bit iffy for my taste :3

After realizing what a piece of shit [PI] is, I wasted an entire day trying to fix one single bug.
Didn’t work out.
Started working on it anyways.
Need to use predefined item spawn commands now.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] SmdScape
item.dc:creator: @SmdScape SmdScape
item.description:
@SmdScape wrote:

I’ve begun working on my server again.
Here are some screenshots~
[spoiler]

[/spoiler]

[size=12pt]Quests[/size]
[spoiler]Quest points also save and add up.

Completed -
Black Knights’ Fortress
Cook’s Assistant
Dragon Slayer
Rune Mysteries
Sheep Shearer
Shield of Arrav

In progress -
Imp catcher
Priest in Peril[/spoiler]

Updates below –

2/19/2014:

[ul][li]Began working on Dragon Slayer.[/li]
[li]Added every bone to Prayer.[/li]
[li]Added functioning lamps.[/li]
[li]Added Ice Queen.[/li]
[li]Added dragons in Brimhaven dungeon.[/li]
[li]Updating quest progress.[/li][/ul]
2/20/2014:
[ul][li]Completed Dragon Slayer quest.[/li]
[li]Completed Cook’s Assistant quest.[/li][/ul]
2/21/2014
[ul][li]Added quest complete interfaces.[/li]
[li]Completed Slayer tasks (level requirements, all tasks), all that’s left to do is place the npcs and add item requirements (like slayer gloves being needed for this and that, mirror shield for this and that)[/li][/ul]
2/22/2014
[ul][li]Added glassblowing.[/li][/ul]
8/4/2014

[ul][li]Changed quest ‘Cabin Fever’ back to actual text rather than it displaying your crush bonus.[/li]
[li]Saved all F2P quest variables.[/li]
[li]Added additional shops in Ardy.[/li]
[li]Began adding messages when objects were clicked.[/li]
[li]Fun little scroll drop that relates to the chest at home ;3[/li]
[li]Added sheep shearing quest.[/li][/ul]
[font=verdana]8/5/2014[/font]
[ul][li][font=verdana]Balanced necklace (Yin-Yang necklace with altered stats)[/font][/li]
[li]Added Silver and Gold to smelt-able ores. Added multiple ore requirements.[/li]
[li]Added skill tomes.[/li]
[li]Added Christmas crackers.[/li]
[li]Started Black Knight’s Fortress quest.[/li][/ul]
[font=verdana]8/6/2014[/font]
[ul][li][font=verdana]Fixed Dragon Slayer quest.[/font][/li]
[li][font=verdana]Clicking on banks prompts you to decide between opening the bank and doing nothing rather than just opening it immediately.[/font][/li]
[li][font=verdana]Began adding aggressive NPCs.[/font][/li]
[li][font=verdana]Began adding considerably more thieving options.[/font][/li][/ul]
[font=verdana]8/8/2014[/font]
[ul][li][font=verdana]All meat is now cook-able.[/font][/li]
[li]Began adding shortcuts.[/li]
[li]Began adding all mining spots.[/li]
[li]Added staff enchanting. Turns regular element staffs into element battlestaffs.[/li][/ul]
[font=verdana]8/11/2014[/font]
[ul][li][font=verdana]Leather crafting works.[/font][/li]
[li][font=verdana]Zaff has his own store.[/font][/li]
[li][font=verdana]Added Magic Logs. (Incredibly annoying seeing an item without a model)[/font][/li][/ul]
[font=verdana]8/13/2014[/font]
[ul][li][font=verdana]Fixed Sheep Shearer quest.[/font][/li]
[li][font=verdana]Added sailing.[/font][/li]
[li][font=verdana]Salve amulet works properly on ALL undead npcs.[/font][/li]
[li][font=verdana]Can smelt gold and silver now.[/font][/li][/ul]
[font=verdana]8/21/2014[/font]
[ul][li][font=verdana]Stated working on the skill menus.[/font][/li][/ul]
5/27/2015

[ul][li]Black Knights’ Fortress quest[/li]
[li]Rouges Den - Cooking, Banker & Wall safes[/li]
[li]Report System[/li]
[li]Highscores[/li]
[li]Improved Spec bar[/li]
[li]Glory recharging[/li]
[li]Bones to peaches/bananas[/li]
[li]Cape dying[/li]
[li]Desert heat/cactus cutting[/li]
[li]God Books w/ preaches[/li]
[li]GS specs[/li]
[li]Most skill menus[/li][/ul]
5/28/2015

[ul][li]Fixed bank dupe.[/li]
[li]Birds nests[/li]
[li]Proper stall thieving. If at a gem stall, you can steal gems. If at a seed stall, you steal multiple seeds of one ID at a time, etc…[/li]
[li]All food has been added[/li][/ul]
5/29/2015

[ul][li]Cycle events[/li]
[li]Cycle-based woodcutting/mining[/li]
[li]Ava’s Accumulator[/li]
[li]Dragon Claws[/li][/ul]
6/3/2015

[ul][li]NPC clipping[/li]
[li]Can open doors, climb stairs and ladders.[/li]
[li]Started working on Shield of Arrav quest.[/li]
[li]Banking works flawlessly. Insert, no longer generates random items if you drag item1 on item2.[/li][/ul]
6/10/2015

[ul][li]Added spirit shields.[/li]
[li]Tab to reply to private messages.[/li][/ul]
6/12/2015

[ul][li]Added Slayer helm.[/li]
[li]Added Slayer helm effect.[/li][/ul]
9/5/2015

[ul][li]Added Ava’s Accumulator and effects.[/li]
[li]Added proper books. (you can flip through pages, etc.)[/li]
[li]Finished Shield of Arrav.[/li]
[li]Started on legitimate training spots.[/li][/ul]
9/13/2015

[ul][li]Added milling.[/li]
[li]Re-doing every npc drop.[/li]
[li]Changed quest interface.[/li]
[li]Can open gates.[/li][/ul]
10/20/2015

[ul][li]Added proper Kalphite Queen [/li][/ul]
10/21/2015

[ul][li]Zanaris and Entrana are completed[/li]
[li]All fishing spots have been added.[/li]
[li]Items spawn throughout the world, just like on runescape.[/li][/ul]
10/26/2015

[ul][li]Added bob repairing broken barrows items. Only works on fully degraded equipment.[/li]
[li]Proper amulet of glory, can also recharge underneath hero’s guild[/li][/ul]
10/28/2015

[ul][li]Added Fight Cave with 63 waves.[/li]
[li]Added warning going into wildly.[/li][/ul]
1/23/2016

[ul][li]Added pies, pizzas, tuna potatoes, cakes and more.[/li]
[li]Player walks towards object if item is used on object.[/li][/ul]

Read full topic
